EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Event_TrackerTrainings_Q314.Reminder Invite - Palo Alto Sept. 22, 2014
EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER - Pivotal Tracker Training Session Invite (Sept. 22 in Palo Alto)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}}, Just a quick reminder that you and a member of your team are invited to an exclusive Pivotal Tracker Training Session on Sept. 22 from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. at our Palo Alto office. We’ll walk through Pivotal Tracker’s capabilities and share a few advanced tips and tricks. Most importantly, we want to hear from you and we'll have experts on-hand to answer all of your Tracker and project management questions. Seating is limited to the first 12 registrants. Event details are below. Pivotal Tracker Training Session Date: Monday, Sept. 22, 2014 Time: 11 a.m. - 1 p.m. (lunch will be provided) Location: 3495 Deer Creek Road, Palo Alto, CA Cost: This invite-only session is free to attend. Reply to this email to RSVP. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask. We look forward to hosting you for this special event! Thanks again. Regards, Charles Charles Springer Pivotal Tracker
